function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Influence of meteorological factors on air change rates may impact the spread of contagious diseases in indoor environments.","Impact":"Uncontrolled air change rates may lead to an increased risk of disease transmission in indoor spaces.","Mitigation":"Implementing effective ventilation systems and control measures to regulate air change rates and minimize the spread of contagious diseases.","Technologies":"Ventilation systems with air quality sensors, air purifiers, and air filtration systems.","People":"Occupants of indoor spaces, including residential homes and public buildings.","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, and public health authorities."}]}
